All email addresses are now on a ncr.com domain and are provided below for your convenience. DUMAC email addresses that were previously used to contact support will be disabled on July 15th. Please click here <[[https://go.ncr.com/rs/605-BQY-740/images/Restaurant as a Service Support - W.vcf]]> to download the vCard that contains the updated email address for support of the NCR Restaurant as a Service solution.
